title: ICCV 2025 CV4MS Workshop in Hawaii, USA
description: Mr. Hieu and Mr. Nam attended the CV4MS Workshop at ICCV 2025, held in Hawaii, USA.

title: New Paper Alert, Adv.E.I. by Mr. Phan
description: Congratulations! Mr. Phan’s paper, 'Parameter-Aware High-Fidelity Microstructure Generation Using Stable Diffusion,' has been accepted by AEI.

title: New Paper Alert!! Mater. Charact. by Dr. Tran
description: Congratulations! Dr. Trans’s paper, 'Microstructure-informed forming limits in aluminum alloys: Experiments and crystal plasticity simulations,' has been accepted by Mater. Charact.

title: MRM 2025 in Yokohama, Japan
description: Dr. Tran and Mr. Cuong attended the Materials Research Meeting (MRM) 2025 held in Yokohama, Japan.
